123111.title: Soi Fon.

1231112.content:
As I was running towards Rangiku and Soi Fon's direction, Rangiku picked Soi Fon up and started to run away.

"I won't let you any of our bodies!" Growl, Haineko!

The ash started to surround me. At this moment, a cero was shot and cleared away the sand.

"Such a bothersome kid." said Ulquorria as I saw Hitsugaya lying down with blood coming out of his body. "Don't worry, I did not kill him. Now isn't it time to get that body of yours?"

Ulquorria released his reiatsu enough to make Rangiku fall onto the ground and drop Soi Fon's body.

"What is this massive amount of reiatsu... I cant stand properly.. My legs are shivering.." Rangiku whimpered.

"Now's my chance" I thought as I aimed towards Rangiku's body but I accidentely tripped over a rock and fell into Soi Fon's body.

"Argh.." I said as I stood up in Soi Fon's body trying to balance myself.

"Let's go, Aizen-sama is impatient." Ulquorria said.

"Yeah sure." I said as I knocked Rangiku unconscious and followed Ulquorria behind into the garganta.


At Aizen's hall.

"I see you have successfully brought the first person here and brought a body to swap to later? I suppose." Aizen said laughing.

"Yeah that is correct." As I took out the device and swapped into Rangiku, trying to find my new centre of gravity but failed miserably and fell onto the ground with my new orange and silky hair lying on my shoulders.

"She has really done well in keeping herself pretty." I thought and picked up the device.

As I left Soi Fon's body on the ground, I asked, "What are you planning to do with her body?"

"Nothing much, we are just testing out a body switching machine and to lower Soul Society's defences before we attack." Aizen said. "Szayel Aporro Granz, the ninth espada. Bring the experiment here!"

Szayel Aporro Granz said, "Yes, Aizen-sama."

Not long, he pushed two beds with metal restrains along with two device which is suppose to be put on the head, connected to a computer system. He keyed in some things into the system and showed a thumbs up.

"Ok, Bring her body onto the bed and restrain her!" Aizen commanded.

"Yes Aizen-sama."

The Espadas all stood waiting in anticipation while I sat watching.

"Who shall be the test subject? Aizen-sama" Szayel Aporro Granz said.

"That would be me." Halibel said.

Halibel lied on the bed and was restrained as well.

Soi Fon regained conscious. "Where am I?" As she blinked, she saw Aizen, "AIZEN!!!! YOU BETRAYER!!"

"I guess you should be more worried about yourself right now. We are going to switch your body with Halibel's" He smirked.

"Systems ready, Countdown in 5seconds." Szayel Aporro Granz said.

"WHAT?!?!! LET ME GO!!" Soi Fon screamed as she tried to break free.

5,4,3,2,1. Both their bodies seems to be soul-less as none of them moved at all. Soon, Soi Fon's body started to move and slowly opened her eyes. Did it work? Everyone was looking in anticipation.

"Aizen-sama, it worked!!! Although now I feel much smaller." the new Soi Fon said.

"Ok, do the switching back process and lock Soi Fon's body up. We will need it in time to come." Aizen said.

"Now, Human, quickly return and bring Hitsugaya back to Soul Society, pretending that "Soi Fon" had already been caught and that you failed and carry on your mission." Aizen said.

Back at the real world,

I did like what Aizen said and sent him to the 4th squad barracks.

I told Hitsugaya like what Aizen told me to do and I was ordered to report this to the Captain Commander. After doing so.. I returned to visit Hitsugaya but my main motive was to.. Capture Unohana.

I look around the 4th squad barrack and found both Yoruichi and Unohana are in the barracks. "Hehe" I thought, "This is going to be easier than I thought.."

I decided to take _______ then knock the other unconscious and bring it back.
1231112.title: Next Target.

12311121.content:
I took out the device slowly, preparing to zap Yoruichi, use whatever techniques she had to knock Unohana unconscious. Being the fastest shinigami would probably gave an advantage in cases like this. Just before I zapped Yoruichi though, I had a moment of hesitation. Those two are the strongest female Shinigami in the entire Gotei 13. Taking over 1 body would be easy, but doing so in front of another one, would be very suspicious. Not to mention if Mayuri had prepared traps and other safety measurements, after all, to capture someone like Soi Fong, would need a very high degree of skill. Hitsugaya must also had reported his findings of the device to the Captain Commander.

I decided to tuck the devices between Rangiku's cleavage, hiding it from sight. It was too risky, not to mention if other Shinigami saw the process. I walked to them, after some chatters which mostly consisted of the abduction of Soi Fong and Hitsugaya's condition, I excused myself and started to walk away to the gate, and intending to leave the barrack. I could feel Unohana and Yoruichi stared at me behind my back, but I just played it cool and although with slightly wavering steps made it outside.

I saw some people raking leaves and various others doing their chores, and could heard some murmurs about Mayuri concocting something to prevent more abduction. As fast as possible, I ran to the meeting point where I supposed to bring also some female Shinigami's body. Upon reaching my destination, I pressed a small button near the feet of a boulder and moments later Soi Fong appeared.

I was shocked and prepared myself for battle, but moments later Ulquiorra appeared. "You appeared to soon, Ulqiorra, I was about to scare this little human to his death" as Soi Fong finished her sentence a wicked smile formed on her face. "We're not here to play games, Loly," then he turned to me, "You didn't bring anyone here, human? Aizen will not be pleased." And as he finished speaking, instantly, the three of us were transported back to Aizen's palace.

Aizen was sitting in his high throne, looking down. On his left, an arrancar I recognized as Menoly (#34) stood. A big black cage was also in the palace, inside, a defiant looking Loly clenched her teeth and clung on tight to the cage's bars. I knew it was only a vessel, with Soi Fong's soul inside. The new Soi Fong calmly walked to her old body, grabbed it by the chin and as a wicked smile appeared, she whispered, "I'm going to miss this body." She then jumped to Aizen's right hand side, creating an odd sight.

Aizen finally spoke "You didn't bring anyone here, human?" His face was calm as always, but I could felt a huge surge of reiatsu tried to pin my body down. I just gasped, "It's getting too dangerous to do that now." A normal human could have died from that amount of spiritual energy, but in Rangiku's body, I was able to barely stand.
12311121.title: Yoruichi, but...

123111211.content:
"Cowardly human! Hah!" Grimmjow exclaimed. "Be quiet Grimmjow," Aizen calmly stated as he began making his way to me. "Forbidden Bakudo 99.9. Soul Extraction." I felt the same feeling as when I was in Soi Fong's body, and Rangiku's body slumped to the floor.

Minutes later the same beds with metal restrains and the computer was set up in another room of the palace. With Menoly and the unconscious Rangiku strapped in tightly. "Now since you're too scared to do the mission, human, Menoly will go with you, in Rangiku's form and you'll follow her in your spirit form." I just nodded, unsure of anything else to say.

"Then we start, Aizen-sama." Syazel the ninth Espada said. Aizen just nodded in affirmation and returned to his seat. The machinery blinked a few times and Menoly closed her eyes in anticipation. Rangiku however, had just began to stir and opened her mouth, but before she got a say, the swap was happening. The room was in silence, I could see Aizen watched the sight with a sinister and satisfied smile. He knew his plan was working.

"At your service, Aizen-sama" was the new Rangiku's first words as she opened her eyes. Menoly's face however, just formed a shocked expression. Aizen had told you to hide yourself, it seemed that he had a plan. "How, how can I get here?" Rangiku, in Menoly's body asked in bewilderment, "The last thing I knew, I was fighting Ulquiorra with Captain Hitsugaya." Then Soi Fong stepped into sight from Aizen's back, immediately Rangiku was silenced.

"Human!" the new Menoly hissed. The new Soi Fong just smiled, Rangiku's body however, had been released from her restrain and after several attempt of walking in her new body, jumped beside Aizen. She then flexed her new arms and shrugged, her hands re-arranged her new orange hair and draped it behind her back. "Now then, nobody would suspect Vice-Captain Rangiku Matsumoto's alibi of trying to get herbs in order to speed up her Captain's recovery would there?" Aizen asked mockingly.

"You!" Menoly hissed again. "Now, take her away!" Aizen commanded. After all Espadas had went away, except for Ulquiorra, new Soi Fong and Rangiku, I was again summoned. The new Soi Fong seemed to like her body very much, and tried out all of Soi Fong's move and a few others. I suspected the body remembered her move, although Loly couldn't possibly have read the original Soi Fong's memory. "Now human, since you're afraid, I will send Menoly with you. She would create a distraction, so you can possess the Shinigami that I wanted, do you understand? I will accept no more failures." Aizen calmly stated, but I knew something terrible will befall me if I failed.

"Rangiku" Aizen then turned to the new Vice Captain. "If he failed, use this. It's a device to capture his spirit form and you can hand it in to Mayuri. It will clear doubts around our dear Vice-Captain." Aizen finished as he threw a small cubic like object. Rangiku caught it, "Yes Aizen-sama". I was shocked, whatever happened, Aizen was going to get his way done. Rangiku then put it in between her new cleavage. The cleavage seemed to be big enough to hide both the cubical device and my body possession device. "Enough talk, human, possess Rangiku, and go back to Soul Society now!" in anticipation, the new Rangiku closed her eyes and willingly let my ghost form took over her body. In that instant, I felt the heaviness in my chest and the two devices dug itself to my new boobs. I shifted their position to make myself comfortable. Aizen then had Ulquiorra accompany me back to the portal.
123111211.title: Returning to Soul Society

1231112111.content:
As I made my way back to Soul Society, I began to ponder upon a fail proof plan that Ulquiorra had passed down to me from Aizen. It would be wise to assume that now Soul Society had been anticipating an attack from my spirit form. I was not too sure of the plan, but I supposed since it was formulated by Aizen, it was of the best intention to follow it through.

I finally reached Soul Society, and as expected by Aizen, the Shinigami had already begun the Forbidden Bakudo training. "It is a technique to capture the soul of an alien being, such as yourself, human." I could remember Ulquiorra explained it during the travel to the giant boulder. "So, it can capture you, but not Menoly's soul that also resides in that Shinigami's body." I gulped, this mission was going to get tougher and tougher.

I decided to go after Unohana's body. Yoruichi would be the hardest to possess, and as I figured that Unohana didn't have any offensive skills, so it's best bet to get to get her first, possess her, swap her with one of the Arrancars, then come back and catch Yoruichi. Plus I knew perfectly well where Unohana was.

I made my way to Hitsugaya's room. According to the medical attendants, Hitsugaya was still unable to fight normally, although he had assisted on teaching other Shinigami on how to exercise the Forbidden Bakudo. As I ascend the last step however, the sight of Unohana made me to gasp. I had prepared myself to execute the plan, however, to see Unohana standing guard on Hitsugaya's door made me to doubt whether the plan would actually work.

"Where were you Matsumoto-san?" Unohana greeted me with a smile. "I, uh I was looking for herbs for Captain Hitsugaya." I stammered as I fidgeted. 'Ah, thank you, but that's the job of us, medical division, I want to talk to you in private, follow me please." Unohana then lead me to an empty storage room at the far end of the corridor, exactly something that was planned by Aizen.

As I followed her, I relaxed my control over Rangiku's body, making Menoly inside to start slowly getting her consciousness. The effect was a slight daze, but I managed just fine to control her movement. As soon as we arrived in the room, Unohana clicked the door close, "Forgive me, but I need to make sure. Soul Extraction!" The moment had come so I willingly let myself be separated from my vessel and in that instant, Rangiku's body dropped to the floor.

I struggled against Unohana's grip. The Forbidden Bakudo made me unable to possess her by phasing into her hands. Unohana had asked a lot of question. I delayed to answer them as I saw Rangiku's body started to gain consciousness. "Unohana, what, what happened?" Rangiku stammered in act. "You've awaken, Matsumoto-san?" Unohana replied, while still kept her focus and gaze at me. Rangiku approached Unohana from behind, then Menoly in Rangiku smiled and put her index finger in front of her lips, a sign for me that the plan should be carried immediately.

"It, it was Aizen" I stammered. "What?" Unohana asked again, as she gazed again intently on me, intent of squeezing every last drop of information she could get. It was that when suddenly Rangiku's hands bear hugged Unohana from behind. "What?" Unohana exclaimed in surprise.

"It was better to frame a Shinigami, and the one you currently inhabit is the best to lay the blames upon." Ulquiorra had said to me during the travel.

"I'm also working for Aizen-sama, not just the human." the possessed Rangiku whispered to Unohana, intent fully to make the real Rangiku to be blamed. The combination of bear hug and "confession" must had broken Unohana's concentration, as I felt the grip to disappear I quickly floated above their heads. "Now human! What are you waiting for? Let's bring her to Aizen-sama."

Unohana was about to release her shikai, but as soon as she opened her mouth, I entered her through it. Unohana's body shuddered and I felt everything going black. Mission accomplished.

I woke up standing, instead of the usual lying flat position after possession had happened. I also felt powerful, although restrained a pair of slender arms in bear hug position. "Menoly, you can let go now, I got her body." I whispered, trying out my new voice. Then slowly the arms relaxed and I turned around to face Rangiku. "How does it feel, human? To obtain the body of one of the strongest Shinigami in Soul Society? I guess when Aizen-sama meant by growing stronger was this." Menoly asked.

After getting used with Rangiku's body, walking in Unohana's seemed very easy. "Let's go." I turned my new body and unlocked the door. Menoly in Rangiku just followed. I smiled during our way out from the hospital, just like Unohana would. Menoly, however was not good in imitating Rangiku and I had to ask her to put on a frown or a worried face, instead of her expressionless face. It seemed like the body swap didn't affect memories. Luckily, I had read some Bleach books, enough to understand a bit of the characters' personality.

We passed a lot of Shinigami, and I began to ask why Unohana never gets tired from this smiling marathon. All the smiles had visibly strained some muscle. Shouts of Shinigami practicing could be heard, but they were practicing in vain. No one would ever suspected Aizen had implanted another spy that was immune to the Forbidden Bakudo.

On our way out from Soul Society's gates
1231112111.title: The Game Plan

12311121111.content:
"Stop right there!" a voice said.

You and Rangiku turned around and saw a small build girl staring at us. She disappeared and appeared infront of us.

"Sorry. You are not allowed to leave Soul Society without a permit from the captain commander. Captain Unohana, as you know all these female possession thing are around. Nobody is allowed to leave the place." she said. "I hope you understand.."

"She is.. Hinamori. A professional at kidos.." I thought.

"Bakudo 64. Six light rod prison!" you felt something restraining your hands and bodies and saw Rangiku was also bring trapped in the light. "What's the meaning of this?!" Rangiku and I shouted in unison.

"I'm sorry. I have to make sure that both of you are normal. Forbidden Bakudo 99.9 : Soul extraction!"

You felt the same feeling like when you were being pulled out of Soi Fon and Rangiku. My soul was now stuck onto her hands as Unohana's body slumped onto the ground. Hinamori now used it on Rangiku but nothing happened. "I'm glad your alright Rangiku. Sorry for restraining you.we finally caught the soul. You see." Hinamori smiled happily and released her.

Menoly who is now Rangiku said, "Oh yes. Not a problem. I would let to ask, Do you think Aizen-sama would be involved in this?" she smiled and signalled for me to possess when she breaks her concentration.

"Aizen-sama...? Rangiku.. What are you..?" Hinamori facial expression changed.

"Now!" Rangiku shouted.

You quickly phased into her body as soon her concentration broke. You didn't felt as powerful as Unohana but your body was much youthful than Unohana's. "No time to waste, pick up Unohana's body and let's run" Rangiku said.

 Ulquiora was standing there waiting for us, "what took you guys so long? I see you brought one extra body with you this time. Let's go." Aizen was sitting on the chair calmly and smiled.

"I see you brought another vice-captain for me, human and you have successfully captured Unohana. Syazel Aporro Granz, prepare the machine."

"Yes, Aizen-sama!" he said.

"Call in Espada 32nd, Poly." Aizen said.

Once again, Poly's body was at one side of the metal restrained and Unohana's body is at the other. Unohana was beginning to gain conscious. "Where am I..?" she whimpered.

"Carry on with the switch." Aizen commanded.

"Huh..?" she managed to let out a voice. Soon, the switch was complete. Unohana's body now said, "At your service, Aizen-sama."

"Good.. All is going according to plan. Loly, Menoly and Poly. I want the three of you to get used to your body and learn as many moves as you can as possible, work with Syazel as he would be able to take the knowledge out of Soi Fon and Unohana and Rangiku. The bodies that you possess are the best in soul society and is the key to winning the battle between us and the shinigamis. Now Go!" Aizen commanded.

"Now.. As promised i would let you take over any body you may want, regardless of arrancar or shinigami if you capture Yoruichi.. They would all be in a state of chaos in their lost of captains. So its the best time to strike but at the same time, beware of anything that she is wearing, it might capture your soul instead. Here take the body possession device and this extra device, it allows you to open the gargantuan. It is only a two time use. It is for to and fro. I will be awaiting for your arrival.." Aizen grinned.

You activated the device and stepped into the gargantuan. You found yourself on the outskirts of Soul Society where all the herbs could be found. You decided to pretend that you were getting herbs for Hitsugaya. You randomly picked afew and that was when you saw Isane. You decided to talk to Isane so others would not get suspicious of you. "Hey Isane, finding some herbs? For Hitsugaya?" you chuckled to yourself trying to act like Hinamori.

"Haha, yeah, Captain Unohana assigned me to do it." Isane smiled.

"Unohana uh? I see they have not gotten the lastest news about Unohana." you thought.

"Sorry Hinamori, I have got to hurry back." Isane yapped.

"No worries, I'm going back too." You smiled.

The both of you walked together and entered the barracks. You saw Yoruichi standing at the entrance of Hitsugaya's ward and started to wander around. "What are you looking for Yoruichi?" Isane asked.

"Hmm.. I can't Unohana.. I suspect.."

"No! She's one of the most knowledgable and smartest shinigami. She can't get caught.." Isane cried.

Nemu then arrived with a necklace, "Here, accept this necklace that Captain Mayuri had prepared. It prevents any soul from getting into your body as long as you wear it. Any soul that tries to enter will get sucked into the small oval shape and be sealed there. Captain Mayuri has only made one of this so far and this can never come into contact with water or it would malfunction."With that said, Nemu handed the necklace over to Yoruichi and she wore it.

"Please find Captain Unohana..." Isane cried. You pretended to comfort her as you thought how the real Hinamori would do.

"Yes.. Sure. I will find her and bring her back.. I wonder who is behind all this.. And taking the Captain's body." Yoruichi said.

"Hinamori, have you seen Rangiku?" Yoruichi questioned me

"Nope, not at all. What about her? Is she kidnapped too?" You pretended to be concern about her.

"Yeah, she might have something to do with Unohana's and Soi Fon's disappearance." Yoruichi said. "Its getting late, I suggest we girls should stay together for the night don't you think? Why not we have a refreshing bath in the hot spring at the barracks, instead that fine with you Isane?"

"Er.. Yeah sure.." Isane said as she wiped her tears.

"Hot spring..? Now.. It would be much easier to take her body now.." you grinned as you were finally going to be able to have any body you may want.

You went to the hot springs and you saw the naked bodies of Isane and Yoruchi and they quickly told you to do it or they would take it out for you forcefully. Leaving you no choice, you quickly took the clothes and the cloth at my head. I stared at myself at the mirror, "wow, I didn't know Hinamori was this pretty."

Halfway, you told them that you needed to go to the bathroom, you took out the device and aimed at Yoruichi...
12311121111.title: Reader's choice

123111211111.content:
You zapped the device and felt nothing extraordinary, just as the same darkened vision and felt yourself being lightheaded. Then as you heard a thud you could felt yourself sped up to Yoruichi. Then there was darkness.

When you first came to, you could felt nothing. You shook it off as you thought Yoruichi would've drowned, as the result of being temporarily unconscious because of the device. As you waited it's apparent something wasn't right.

"Hook, line and sinker." Yoruichi's voice could be heard, as she sneered gleefully. The truth dawned on you.

"Did you or Aizen thought that we in Soul Society are fools who would let ourselves get kidnapped?" Yoruichi continued.

You realized that you were trapped in the necklace, and Yoruichi held the oval orb closer to her face. Then, her face contorted.

Yoruichi's face twisted and rearranged into Kurotsuchi Mayuri's face, much to your horror and apparently Isane's as you heard her high pitched scream broke throughout the hot spring. "Oh, be quiet, I just saved your life and apparently our ex-captain's", Mayuri rolled his eyes "At least give me some gratitude or cut me some slack."

You awoke with a start some time later, but you felt corporeal again. Which you thought was a good thing, Finally this dream is over you thought, but as you blinked your eyes, you knew it wasn't a dream.

You were inside a small chamber, filled with equipments and surgical tools, not to mention other strange looking objects you never saw in Bleach. You looked down and saw two average sized mound obstructing your view. It was Nemu's body.

"Sorry, for the hospitality, but all my experiments have to be treated the same." Mayuri smirked as he made his way to you, obviously referring to your tied up condition. "You see, I want to know about your strange ability, which I why I transferred your soul to Nemu's body and well, you cannot answer my question while in spirit form."

Mayuri then brandished the body possession device, "It seemed that this is the source of your power, although I can't operate it, even after I disassembled it, build a prototype and tinker with the device." You just cringed at the prospect that if Mayuri accidentally broke the device, then you'd have to stay in Nemu's body forever.

"How did you know?" you finally managed to mutter in your new body.

"Well, if you see a member of Soul Society walked out from the gargantuan, what would you think?" Mayuri rhetorically asked. "I'm curious about you and I wanted to experiment on you, so I set up a plan. Brilliant hmm?"

"So the plan is to lure me out with Yoruichi's body?" you asked.

"Clever boy, obviously you were only going for the strong females, and Yoruichi is the last here." Mayuri smirked as he walked behind your body. "So I infused Nemu's body with the soul trapping reagents that I also used in this necklace, to that addition, I have also reinforced this chamber with that reagent, then I disguised myself as your target and the rest is history."

Mayuri then dragged Isane's unconscious form in front of you. He then cut off the ropes and threw you the device. Something that you didn't thought would ever happen.

"Go on then, possess her", Mayuri urged you, "I want to see how it's done."

You looked at Isane, she was obviously stripped off everything she had, her sword was not with her and on her left eyes, she now wore the same eye patch as Zaraki's, which you knew will drain one's reiatsu. It's apparent that you were just made as an experiment, alongside with Isane and Nemu. You gulped as you held the device, there was no way out of this.

As you pressed the button, you woke up with a start, and noticed that your hair was not as long as it used to be and apparently became silver colored. "So, did you liked it? I made the possession now almost instantaneous, just to speed up our experiment." Mayuri beamed, he was apparently proud of his tinkering. You breathed out a sigh of relief, the device had endured Mayuri's tempering.Your relief was cut short though, as you knees suddenly buckled, it seemed the eye patch was working at full effect, probably to prevent you from using any kido.

"Now, do you want to cooperate with me?" Mayuri asked, although the answer was definite...
123111211111.title: Readers' Choice

choices: The device malfunctioned and you landed in some other female's body nearby.
1231112111111.content:
"What if I refuse?" you asked.

Mayuri held up a bottle. "Then you will be spending the rest of your live in this bottle until you agree to it."

You gulped. "Fine.." you said forcefully.

"Very well, I might actually give you Yoruichi's body if you cooperate well with me." Mayuri said.

"But.. Aren't you suppose to help Gotei 13? Why are you helping me?" you asked.

"I don't care about anyone but myself. Once I get a duplicate of this, all will be good. I will be able to possess any female as well!" Mayuri rubbed his hands and grinned.

"Now.. While I'm doing this, you are going to be in this bottle. I do not like any interruptions. So.. See ya." He tapped the bottle and you felt yourself coming out of Isane's body and labelled the bottle Isane and took another bottle and took Isane's soul out and labelled it as "soul"

You saw Mayuri messing with the device as he tries to pry it open to see the parts that was used in this device. Suddenly.. the door opened slightly and many in black appeared. Yoruichi walked through them and into the centre and confronted Mayuri.

"We detected a spirit here, we suspect that you are hiding the spirit and have something to do with the disappearance of the two captains and a vice-captain. I am hereby arresting you till the central 46 decides what to do with you." Yoruichi said.

Mayuri remained silent and pressed onto a button on his table and disappeared instantly. Yoruichi pounded her fist onto the table. "Dam that freak. Go look around and find him NOW!" Yoruichi ordered.

You have never seen Yoruichi so angry before.. "What have he done to this girls? (referring to Isane and Nemu) I'm positive that he is the person behind all this. Isane's body is empty.. I need to find her soul." Yoruichi said as she bit her thumb.

She looked towards this direction and approached to my direction with caution.

"What am I suppose to do? What will she do to me?" Many questions came crashing into my mind.

She picked up the two bottles. You could feel your heart beating faster and Faster.

"Ahh.. Luckily he didn't do anything to Isane. Her soul is still in here.. And as for this bottle.. I guess I will have to interrogate the soul. Time to place Isane back first." Yoruichi whispered to herself.

"Interrogate..?" you thought.

You saw Yoruichi taking your bottle and pouring into Isane's mouth. You felt yourself going down her throat and you awoke once again in a short silver haired body.

"How ya feeling Isane?" Yoruichi asked smiling.

"Isane..? She thinks I'm Isane?" you thought and saw the bottle was labelled with Isane name. Mayuri must have knew that this might happen and did that!

"Isane..? You alright?" Yoruichi started shaking me.

Trying my best not to get myself exposed, you said, "Uh.. What happened..? Where am I?"

"Your in Captain Mayuri's lab. Apparently, he was using your body as an experiment and has disappeared. We suspect that he is the main cause of the disappearance of your captain and other females.. Why dont you return to your barracks and let me take care of this and I will fill you in later." Yoruichi said as she took off the eye patch off your head.

"Okay Captain Yoruichi." you purposely slummed forward and onto the table and quickly slipped the device into your pocket.

Yoruichi rushed to pick you up. "Are you alright? Do you need me to help you to your barrack?" said Yoruichi with utmost concern.

"Yes I am. thank you. Just carry on with your work." you said.

"Okay. If there's anything I can do to help. Please inform me. Take care." Yoruichi assured you.

An idea came to your mind. You told Yoruichi that she could help you on one thing. It was to find your zanpakutou and you waited outside for her to come. Yoruichi came back with 3 similar looking swords and asked if any of these were my sword.

"Mind if you turn around for a moment?" you asked.

"What for?.. She enquired.

"I need to concentrate on finding which one if mine and I need to make sure no one is looking at me before I do it." you said innocently.

"All right.." Yoruichi surrendered.

When she turned around, you quickly took out the device and aimed to Yoruichi.....

Did you succeed?
1231112111111.title: Reader's choice
